title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practice Competencies: Constructivist-Based E-Learning Design and Interaction Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Three e-learning interactive activities for social studies subjects can be designed by applying constructivist learning theory
The e-learning content structure can be analyzed based on problem-solving scenarios connected to learners' prior experiences
An assessment rubric promoting effective digital interaction in BYOD environments can be developed
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
